transcript: and if you're going to be partners long term you've got to be able to have that conversation depending how that conversation goes then it'll show you if it would be a potential great partnership or not here's my objective I want to have something that's enough meat on the bone for me but enough meat on the bone for you here's my investment that I've already taken because of how much I believe in this apparently there's no cash flow but here's my obvious skin in the game currently you're making no money but I believe what you guys are doing and you just got to be willing to not do the deal
